title: Bug 18285: Double-clicking on import statement transfers to referenced type
description: The current behavior is causing confusion for users, as double-clicking on an import statement in the package view outline opens the editor on the target type, instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
OB: When using Build 20020528, in the package view outline, double-clicking on a type import statement redirects to the editor of the referenced type, not the unit containing the import reference.
EB: When using Build 20020528, in the package view outline, double-clicking on a type import statement should open the editor of the unit hosting the import reference, not the editor of the referenced type.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the software using Build 20020528.
2. Navigate to the package view outline.
3. Double-click on a type import statement.
4. Observe that the editor opens on the referenced type, instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
